General Information

When?

April 15th-17th, 2018 (Sunday evening through Tuesday lunch)

Where?

Flamingo Conference Resort in Santa Rosa NEW Venue!!

Why?

So that researchers can discuss their science, interact, share, and just simply know what tools others might have at hand before reinventing the wheel (and because it’s fun!)
